alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Kershaw (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 9:22PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Fairfield and southwestern Kershaw Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 921 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Longtown, or near Lake Wateree Dam. This storm was nearly stationary. ...Boaters on Lake Wateree Should Seek Safe Harbor... HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Camden, Lake Wateree Dam, Lugoff, Goodale State Park, Lake Wateree State Park, Longtown, Pine Grove Fire Station, Dekalb, North Towne Square Shopping Center, Woodward Airfield and Lake Wateree near Highway 97. This includes Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 90 and 98. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
